QuestData.Title: Control Sample
QuestData.Description: <Brother Nimetz analyzes the samples you've given him.>$b$bThis... this is just basilisk blood!$b$bNo, it's mostly basilisk blood. They've added something to it though. I'll need a control sample to perform a proper comparison.$b$bThey most likely obtained the blood from the crystal spine basilisks, found to the east of their compound. Bring me back some pure samples, and I'll have this elixir figured out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 7 samples of Crystal Spine Basilisk Blood.
QuestData.CompletionText: There's something not quite healthy about this elixir, $n. Even though I haven't completed my analysis, I can sense it.
QuestData.RewardText: This will do. Please hold on for a moment while I test this out.
